body01: I'm an experienced solution architect, passionate about working closely with R&D and users, to define requirements and specifications that accurately reflect the needs of the business and are technically feasible. Very attentive to the robustness of the processes, I favour simplicity as the best asset of a quality solution. My preliminary experience in the packaging sector as Print Production Manager and Packaging Designer allows me to competently understand the specific business needs of each client I work with.
